modName: Mace of Aevar Stone-Singer - a Morrowind artifact
summary:
Adds the Mace of Aevar Stone-SInger to the game.
This weapon appeared before in the Morrowind expansion Bloodmoon.
Now it\'s available for all in Skyrim! With an updated look.
descriptionHtml:
[url=https://twitter.com/PrvtIPrivateEye][img]http://i.imgur.com/N4B7zRX.png[/img][/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/OdJb6.jpg[/img]

This mod will bring the mighty Mace of Aevar Stone-Singer from Morrowind: Bloodmoon to Skyrim.
How can you roam the land of the Nords without this Nordic weapon afterall?
I based the design of the mace on the original from Morrowind but updated the look to fit more into Skyrim.
The mace was one of the strongest weapons in TES:III and I wanted it to look the part for Skyrim too!

The mod contains a custom made mesh for the mace.
The metal parts of the mace use a custom amde texture, but the icey parts use the Glacier textures.
Depending on if and what kind of texture replacements mods you have installed (Real Ice for example), the look of this part of the model may very.
I would actually recommend the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5388 ]Real Ice[/url] mod.
It makes the mace look waaaaay better!

There\'s no quest involved in obtaining the mace.
Look for a chest on an iceberg near Septimus Signus\'s Outpost. Check the screenshots for the exact location.
On the iceberg you\'ll find a chest and a book. The chest is locked. The key is nearby;)
In the chest you\'ll find the mace.

In stats I tried to stay pretty true to Morrowind.
It\'s very heavy, swings very slow but hits way harder than any mace in the game. It also comes with a nasty (but not very special) frost damage enchantment.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Tub2a.png[/img]
[b]Now the important part![/b]
Modders Modders are [b]free[/b] to use the blade (the meshes and the textures) for their own modding projects!
[b]All I ask is credit for my hard work.[/b]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Tub2a.png[/img]
[b]Changelog[/b]

V 1.0
Initial release

V 1.1
You can now upgrade the mace at a grindstone. This requires an ebony ingot, malachite and some frost salts.

V 1.2
-Mace gets bloodied during combat
-Added frost smoke effect to the mace.

V 1.3
Small stats tweaks to make the Mace closer to it\'s stats in Morrowind.
-Damage and costs have been increased. Speed and critical damage have been decreased slighlty

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Tub2a.png[/img]
[b]Translations[/b]

[url=http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/skyrim/mods/armurerie/armes/la_masse_daevar_chantepierre.php]French translation[/url] at La Confr√©rie des Traducteurs

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Tub2a.png[/img]
